transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello
Customer: Hello? Hello. Sir main Shri Vijay Lakshmi packaging mein ho rahi hai Shri Ram ji se.
Executive: Haan bol raha hun boliye.
Customer: Namaskar sir main Priyanka baat kar rahi hun India Mart ki team se sir recorded line pe. Namaskar.
Executive: Theek hai mam namaskar.
Customer: Ab sir jyada waqt nahi lungi do hi minute lungi aapse. Hume ek update aapki taraf se ek feedback receive hua tha sir aapke account manager hain Aryan ji unke sath aapki baat chit hui hogi. Aapne wo conversation ko not satisfied mark kiya hai. Bas yahi aapse samajhna tha sir kya cheez hai kya concern hai usko kaise hum solve kar sakte hain hum us pe work karenge.
Customer: Haan unka phone aaya tha main unko time nahi de paya madam main.
Executive: Okay. To aapke pass whatsapp par ek message aaya jise aapne phir not satisfied mark kiya ki aap santusht nahi hai unki baat chit se.
Customer: Hmm hmm. Mam wo order ke leke hi tha mam. Order bahut small aate hain aur hamara manufacturing plant hai. To hum chhote chhote order pe kaam nahi kar paate.
Customer: 1000 2000 200 300 525 aise na order aate hain mam usme.
Executive: Hamara minimum order quantity kitna rehta hai sir?
Customer: 5000 mam.
Executive: 5000 rehta hai. 5000 10000 20000 50000 is type se order chalte hain.
Executive: Okay to abhi jaise haal filhal mein aap jo leads purchase kar rahe hain sir wo to big order hi hai aur agar rest aap chahenge ki ye filter karke hum aapko help kare na to hum ye bhi kar sakte hain. Hamare pass to orders aate rehte hain sir. Agar jaise hi hume identify hoga agar hum aapko wo connect karke bata de ki is pe baat kar lijiye aap to shayad aapko help ho jayegi sir. Aisa kar le?
Customer: Main baat karta hun sir se subah account manager sir se.
Executive: Matlab aapke manager se?
Customer: Haan haan.
Executive: Matlab aap kya kehna chah rahe hain sir ye company aapki hai na?
Customer: Haan haan.
Customer: Unne unhone mujhe bola tha ki aap video call pe kijiye main aapko samjhata hun to kal main aap unse baat karta hun morning mein.
Executive: Achcha achcha Aryan ji se keh rahe ho aap.
Customer: Haan haan. Haan wo hamare pass kisi order hai sir aap jaisa order humse demand kar rahe ho na main abhi wahi by leads check kar rahi hun. Hamare pass orders available hai. To bas yahi samajhna chah rahi thi ki aap tak kaise pahunchaye agar aap comfortable ho application aap khol lo warna five time matlab din mein aisa hota hai ki jyada nahi dekh sakte five 10 minutes to aap dekh hi sakte ho sir. Hai na hamare pass 17 by leads aati hai sir ek hafte mein agar hum daily basis pe do do pe bhi baat kar rahe hain na sir to bhi 100% consume ho jayega hamara. To daily ke ek tarike se aap ye socho ki do buyer aise dhundhe hain jinka order quantity 5000 se upar ho to usme hum aapki help kar denge. Rest jo incoming calls aati hai sir jaise wo kai baar miss ho jati hai to unka number nikalna aapko aata hai sir call back karne ke liye?
Customer: Hmm hmm nikal liya mam maine kai baar miss ho jati hai na.
Executive: Okay okay wo lead manager se hi nikalte hain na sir?
Customer: Yes mam.
Executive: Aur koi aur number add karwana chahenge sir koi agar aapke waha pe koi staff ho koi ladka ho aap chah rahe ho ki unko sikha de to hum waise bhi aapki help kar sakte hain ki unko thoda training de denge. Taki aap aur wo dono thoda kaam baat sako.
Customer: Theek hai mam.
Executive: Iska koi aisa cost nahi hai sir free of cost hai aisa kuch nahi hai ki hum koi payment demand karenge. Help purpose se bas main call karke samajhna chah rahi thi ki kya cheeze hain jo hum sudhar sakte hain taki aapka bhi bacha hua experience hum theek kar sake sir.
Customer: Okay mam.
Executive: To phir kaise baat kare sir kal kare baat aapse phir video call pe?
Customer: Haan wo sir se bol dijiyega wo laga lenge mujhe. Kya Aryan ji hai main unse bolti hun wo baat karenge unke manager Shubham ji. Aap unka message main phone kar lunga mujhe unka number de dijiye ek baar unko bhi.
Executive: Whatsapp kar do isi pe ya main Aryan ko hi bolti hun aapko connect kar le unke manager hain Shubham ji wo bhi rahenge meeting mein taki acche se sari cheez discuss ho sake. Baki kuch aur agar aapko lag raha hai sir koi query hai to aap batao koi naye products add karne ho to bhi aap bata dena wo over the call hi ho jayenge same time pe.
Customer: Theek hai mam.
Executive: Ya kuch aur sir aap batao kuch aur hai hamari taraf se to baki kal morning mein 11 baje tak main karwa do main unko message to message dalwa deti hun. Baki aap samay bhi ek baar confirm kar do.
Executive: Kis time tak sir karwaun call?
Customer: Haan yahi mam 11:30 ya 12 tak.
Executive: Theek hai. Theek hai sir. Aur agar koi aur concern nahi hai to ye jo aapne not satisfied feedback diya tha sir ise main close samjhu?
Customer: Theek hai mam.
Executive: Kal main aapko bhi whatsapp pe ek baar na details share karwa deti hun theek hai aur kal ek baar connect karte hain aur jo bhi over the call sara theek karwa denge.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Theek hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer received small orders, not minimum quantity.

- Customer marked conversation with Aryan as dissatisfied.



Resolution:

- Executive offered to filter leads for big orders.

- Executive offered training to staff for lead management.

- Executive will schedule a video call for tomorrow.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will share details on WhatsApp.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- leads, order quantity, training, feedback
